text: 8.28: Ro 9.11; 9.23-24; Ef 1.11; 2 T 1.9Nza kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme za kha bigi ga mbui, nta wari tɨgap ŋgarav tɨvar vhuun ndavar ana ndɨɨi gumgi gu mbigi ga mbui. Mba gumgi gu mbigi, Fhe Bakɨme taagip mbe ndir zav suaŋgiap mben kamgi. Ana mben kamgim, mbe ana vuzvuga zɨn ŋgɨp, ana muun zav suaŋgi ŋaari, mbe ntan muunga.
